column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We ordered desserts too. We got the green tea and chocolate mochi balls
column2: but I fucking hate mochi balls. I always think if I try it again I'll like it
column3: but I don't. If you never had them
column4: it taste like dough that's not cooked.. it's so hard to chew and you're literally chewing for-fucking-ever.
